text:
RELIGION

Selva Vinayagar Temple : Theipirai Ashtami, special puja, Railway Colony, 5 p.m.

Arulmigu Meenakshi Sundareswarar Temple : Discourse on ‘Periya Puranam’, Old Thirukalyana Mandapam, 5 p.m.

Thiruvalluvar Kazhagam : Discourse on ‘Tirumandiram’ by S. Tirumavalavan, North Adi Street, 7 p.m.

Arulmigu Athi Meenakshi Udanurai Athi Chokkanathar and Pechi Amman Temples : Pujas, Sakkudi, 9 a.m. and 5 p.m.

Tiruvalluvar Mandram : Discourse on ‘Kantha Puranam’ by A. Arumugam, S.S. Colony, 5 p.m.

Panniru Thirumurai Mandram : Discourse on ‘Sivagnana Botham’ by N.S. Sundararaman, South Avadi Street, 7 p.m.

St. Lourdes Shrine : 96th anniversary celebrations, K.Pudur, 6 a.m. and 6 p.m.

CULTURE

International Sivananda Yoga Vedanta Centre : Yoga and meditation classes, 444 KK Nagar East Ninth Street, 6 a.m., 6.30 p.m., 10 a.m. and 4 p.m. (for women).

Prajapita Brahma Kumaris Ishwariya Vishwa Vidyalaya : Free rajayoga meditation classes, 36 Meenakshi Nagar, P and T Nagar, 40 Sambandamoorthy Street, 47 B CMR Road and 357 Anna Nagar, 6.30 a.m. and 5.30 p.m.

GENERAL

The American College: Daniel Poor Memorial Library inauguration of centenary celebrations, inauguration of Book Fair by Mayor, V.V. Rajan Chellappa, 10 a.m.

Madurai Media Club : Talk on ‘Arignartham Idhaya Odai’, Gandhi Nagar, 5:30 p.m.

Sourashtra College : Seminar on ‘Role of Company Secretary’, BBA Block, 10 a.m.

SBOA Matric HSS : NSS camp, Melakuyilkudi Community Centre, 8 a.m.; AIDS and Health awareness rally, 2 p.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous : Meeting, Holy Redeemers Church, Pondy Bazar, 7 a.m.; Quality Care Hospital, Ellis Nagar, 7 p.m.; A.G. Church, Gomathipuram, 7 p.m.
title: madurai today
